answers.answer: My doctor didnt ask me if i wanted to, i dont think thats something doctors typically give you a choice on unless theres some kind of reason behind it. They want babies to stay in as long as possible. My doctor told me she is inducing me a week earlier than my due date because i have gestational diabetes unless he comes early.
Oh ok that's one of the reasons and how was it ? How long did last  mami ?  My doctor says she only wait past 41 weeks  the most to induce her mom's .

I work in health care. It is believed that 41 weeks should be max. You do have the right to wait as long as baby is safe. If you wait past that time they will have you do non stress tests often to check on babies health and safety.  It has a bigger risk as your placenta matures. I agreed to being induced with my 3rd but went 9 days over with baby number 1. Both were healthy. My health care providers and I talked about my comfort levels and I was informed before talking to them. They expressed what they think and presented a case too. In the end, we both agreed. I am on baby #4, and my dr and I will decide together what is best for me and baby.
Well your comment it's a relief to me thanks for your info . My best wishes to you mama . God bless you

question: If yes or not please explain the reasons  why you decided to be induced  . I'm really interested in the way doctor work  , if it was right or not .
title: we're you agree when the doctor told you that you need to get induced
